      • getEntities

        java.util.List<FL_Entity> getEntities(java.util.List<java.lang.String> entities)
                                      throws org.apache.avro.AvroRemoteException
        Returns a set of entities by uid. Service URL: /entity/list HTTP Method: POST or GET
        Parameters:
        entities - uids of entities to retrieve
        Returns:
        entities
        Throws:
        org.apache.avro.AvroRemoteException

      • getAccounts

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<FL_Entity>> getAccounts(java.util.List<java.lang.String> entities)
                                                                      throws org.apache.avro.AvroRemoteException
        Returns a set of accounts for each given entity. Service URL: /entity/accounts HTTP Method: POST or GET
        Parameters:
        entities - uids of entities to retrieve
        Returns:
        map of input entity IDs to an array of the accounts for that entity
        Throws:
        org.apache.avro.AvroRemoteException

      • getFlowAggregation

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<FL_Link>> getFlowAggregation(java.util.List<java.lang.String> entities,
                                                                         java.util.List<java.lang.String> focusEntities,
                                                                         FL_DirectionFilter direction,
                                                                         FL_LinkTag tag,
                                                                         FL_DateRange date)
                                                                           throws org.apache.avro.AvroRemoteException
        Returns links to other entities related to specify entities. Each Link returned should represent multiple records, used for displaying flow. See the specification for the Flow Data View. See the specification for the Time Series Data View. Service URL: /link/flow HTTP Method: POST or GET
        Parameters:
        entities - uids of entities to retrieve links for
        focusEntities - uids of focus entities (may be null)
        direction - one of: SOURCE, DESTINATION, BOTH
        tag - one of: FINANCIAL, SOCIAL, COMMUNICATION
        date - in the given date range
        Returns:
        map of input entity IDs to an array of the links for that entity
        Throws:
        org.apache.avro.AvroRemoteException

      • getTimeSeriesAggregation

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<FL_Link>> getTimeSeriesAggregation(java.util.List<java.lang.String> entities,
                                                                               java.util.List<java.lang.String> focusEntities,
                                                                               FL_LinkTag tag,
                                                                               FL_DateRange date)
                                                                                 throws org.apache.avro.AvroRemoteException
        Returns links to other entities related to specify entities. Each Link returned should represent multiple records, used for displaying time series. See the specification for the Time Series Data View. Service URL: /link/series HTTP Method: POST or GET
        Parameters:
        entities - uids of entities to retrieve links for
        focusEntities - uids of focus entities (may be null)
        tag - one of: FINANCIAL, SOCIAL, COMMUNICATION
        date - in the given date range
        Returns:
        map of input entity IDs to an array of the links for that entity
        Throws:
        org.apache.avro.AvroRemoteException

      • getAllTransactions

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<FL_Link>> getAllTransactions(java.util.List<java.lang.String> entities,
                                                                         FL_LinkTag tag,
                                                                         FL_DateRange date,
                                                                         FL_SortBy sort,
                                                                         java.util.List<java.lang.String> linkFilter,
                                                                         long max)
                                                                           throws org.apache.avro.AvroRemoteException
        Returns links to other entities related to specify entities. Each link returned should represent one raw transaction. For financial data, these transactions will form a ledger. For communications or social data, these are un-aggregated links for drill down by the user. CHANGED IN 1.4 Service URL: /link/transactions HTTP Method: POST or GET
        Parameters:
        entities - uids of entities to retrieve links for
        direction - one of: SOURCE, DESTINATION, BOTH
        tag - one of: FINANCIAL, SOCIAL, COMMUNICATION
        date - in the given date range
        sort - Sort order for transactions
        linkFilter - If provided, only return transactions where the "other side" is in this list
        max - Trim the number of results this this value.
        Returns:
        map of input entity IDs to an array of the transactions for that entity
        Throws:
        org.apache.avro.AvroRemoteException
